articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Report: Apple’s smart home ambitions include “tabletop robot,” cameras, and more - Ars Technica
articles.description: Apple has purportedly been working on new smart home devices for years now.

articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: After first operational launch, here’s the next big test for ULA’s Vulcan rocket - Ars Technica
articles.description: This launch was a big success, but it doesn’t necessarily quash anxieties about ULA’s ability to deliver.
